programme.desc: Profilage: Created by Fanny Robert, Sophie Lebarbier. With Jean-Michel Martial, Raphaël Ferret, Philippe Bas, Valérie Dashwood. Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. She's very sweet, she wears very colored clothes and a huge yellow bag. She looks like a little girl who needs a doll, but she's very smart and a very good profiler. Step by step, she fits in the team and her colleagues, very reserved at first, become her best friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1418572/","name":"Profilage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY0ZmE1ZWQtNjEzNy00YWE0LTkzOTgtNjc3MjQ2NWQ4YzYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTI2OTA2NTEw._V1_.jpg","description":"Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. Seal Team
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sm1424"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best military show to date","reviewBody":"For the life me, I can't understand how anyone can compare this show to "Six" or "the Brave". Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. programme.title: Inferno
Inferno
programme.desc:
Inferno: Directed by Ron Howard. With Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones, Omar Sy, Irrfan Khan. When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3062096/","name":"Inferno","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTE2NTkzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDAzOTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3062096/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointing and Predictable Story","reviewBody":"The geneticist Bertrand Zobrist (Ben Foster) is hunted down by three men and commits suicide from the top of a tower in Florence. Zobrist believes that the Earth's population that has an exponential growth should be reduced in 50% to save the other 50%. In Florence, Professor Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) awakens in a hospital with no memory of the last two days and with daydreams and dreadful visions. Dr. Sienna Brooks (Felicity Jones) explains that he has a head trauma cause by a bullet that scratched his head and he would recover his memory in a few days. Out of the blue, a doctor tells that the police wants to interrogate him and a police officer, who is indeed the killer Vayentha (Ana Ularu), shoots the doctor but Sienna and Langdon succeeds to escape to her apartment. Langdon finds a Faraday pointer in the pocket of his jacket and when they project the image, they see the Map of Dante's Inferno by Sandro Botticelli. They contact the American Consulate but give the wrong address nearby the apartment. Soon the area is under siege of the World Health Organization (WHO) agents and the local police, including Vayentha, and Langdon and Sienna conclude that Zobrist has created a virus to annihilate the world's population. But who can be trusted?

"Inferno" completes the trilogy of Dan Brown based on the adventures of Professor Robert Langdon with a totally disappointing and predictable story. The screenplay is a mess and the camera work and edition are awful. Robert Langdon is a superman since he is wounded and with amnesia, but capable of run, jump over the walls, recalls details such as hidden passages and door in different locations etc. The plot point with Sienna Brooks is totally predictable and it was obvious that she had teamed up with Langdon to find where the virus is. The romance between Langdon and Elizabeth Sinskey, performed by the unknown Sidse Babett Knudsen, has no chemistry. In the end, "Inferno" is absolutely forgettable. My vote is five.

Title (Brazil): "Inferno"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":166998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2016-10-13","keywords":"amnesia,church,museum,police,virus","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi396539673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTEwNzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDUzNTUyOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTEwNzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDUzNTUyOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Sienna Brooks, a doctor he hopes will help him recover his memories. The Rundown
programme.desc:
The Rundown: Directed by Peter Berg. With Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Rosario Dawson, Christopher Walken. A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0327850/","name":"The Rundown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU3ZDYxZjMtZmYyOS00NWQyLTk1MmItNDg4ZWM2ZGQxOTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0327850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thekingster"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"B+ Flick...mindless entertainment","reviewBody":"This movie will appeal to all who like action for the sake of action. "The Rock" does a moderate job of acting in this movie-but his performance would not win him any awards. I love the fight scene in the beginning against the football team. Overrated and improbable: of course...but it really appeals to the thrill seeker in me for some reason.

Sean William Scott plays off The Rock's character very well. I was disappointed with his performances in American Pie/Wedding. I thought he was a foul-mouthed, obviously stereotyped actor. I was pleasantly surprised at his different acting ability in this movie.

This movie is a B+ flick with good fight scenes and low budget story lines. Good for mindless entertainment.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104303,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-03-17","keywords":"jungle,bounty hunter,brazil,gold mine,buddy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Rundown","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2038871577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDY4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTg4MTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDY4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTg4MTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Rundown"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005405/","name":"Seann William Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000916/","name":"Peter Berg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829739/","name":"R.J. programme.title: Underworld: Awakening
Underworld: Przebudzenie
Underworld: Awakening
programme.desc:
Underworld: Awakening: Directed by Måns Mårlind, Björn Stein. With Kate Beckinsale, Stephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Theo James. When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1496025/","name":"Underworld: Awakening","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMjc0ODk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTc5NDQwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1496025/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ocacia"},"dateCreated":"2012-01-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad as junk goes","reviewBody":"Lets be honest you do not go into a cinema billing "Underworld: Awakening" expecting "Silence of the Lamb" or "Elegy" this is fast food cinema. The rules of critique that might apply to Spike Lee are therefore not applicable here. So understand my rating of 7/10 is factoring in that. It is 6/10 for fast food cinema. 

The action was tight, the objectives of the film were clear. Certain "chosen one" themes i found boring and the film really must find other incentives for Werewolves to hunt vamps. There is something cool about Kate, I don't know what cuz she just looks like a normal Brit, but she is def the kick ass chick of this era. I mean would you pick her or Ms. Weaver to protect you. Well Ms. Weaver cant bounce off walls so I am sticking with Kate. 

Some parts could have been better but that is always the case. I was happy not to see certain actors but I miss that old dude, Man he was evil. I mean he was really the best. IMDb data; ttnr: 1496025, Title: Underworld: Awakening, --- Description: Underworld: Awakening: Directed by Måns Mårlind, Björn Stein. With Kate Beckinsale, Stephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Theo James. When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1496025/","name":"Underworld: Awakening","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMjc0ODk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTc5NDQwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1496025/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ocacia","dateCreated":"2012-01-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad as junk goes","reviewBody":"Lets be honest you do not go into a cinema billing "Underworld: Awakening" expecting "Silence of the Lamb" or "Elegy" this is fast food cinema. The rules of critique that might apply to Spike Lee are therefore not applicable here. So understand my rating of 7/10 is factoring in that. It is 6/10 for fast food cinema. 

The action was tight, the objectives of the film were clear. Certain "chosen one" themes i found boring and the film really must find other incentives for Werewolves to hunt vamps. There is something cool about Kate, I don't know what cuz she just looks like a normal Brit, but she is def the kick ass chick of this era. I mean would you pick her or Ms. Weaver to protect you. Well Ms. Weaver cant bounce off walls so I am sticking with Kate. 

Some parts could have been better but that is always the case. I was happy not to see certain actors but I miss that old dude, Man he was evil. I mean he was really the best. I don't know the future of the franchise and I hope it doesn't turn into the Dark Knight Cop villain relationship.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":150021,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2012-01-20","keywords":"vampire,selene character,woman fights a man,woman murders a man,murderess","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1011654169","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NDE5MDUyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzM1NzQyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NDE5MDUyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzM1NzQyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sm1424"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best military show to date","reviewBody":"For the life me, I can't understand how anyone can compare this show to "Six" or "the Brave". Absolutely no comparison. This is the most realistic show about a SF unit that I have seen. Though not without it's technical imperfections, the interaction , dedication, and brotherhood between these men is the most realistic I've seen depicted in a television series. The casual wise cracks, character interaction, and frequent jokes made to diffuse the stress of the mission, deployments and balancing family/personal life, is greatly portrayed. Bravo from a 26-year vet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle: Directed by Jake Kasdan. With Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Jack Black, Karen Gillan. Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2283362/","name":"Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ0NDhjYWItYTMxZi00NTk2LWIzNDEtOWZiYWYxZjc2MTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2283362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mikayakatnt"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun, Silly Twist on the Original. Watch with Your Kids","reviewBody":"This is such a dumb movie but honestly that's what makes it so great. Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle is a fun movie that doesn't take itself seriously and it shows. Of course it's a twist on the original Jumanji movie that will never capture the same magic. But for everyone expecting it to be a giant flop, it ends up being pretty fun.\n\n3.5/5. Above expectations.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":344475,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-12-20","keywords":"jungle,trapped in a game,title based on song,song in title,high school","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3413817625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUxNzE5MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwNzE2MzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUxNzE5MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwNzE2MzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four teenagers discover an old video game console and are literally drawn into the game's jungle setting becoming the adult avatars they choose."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2394794/","name":"Karen Gillan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366389/","name":"Kevin Hart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440458/","name":"Jake Kasdan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332017/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle is a fun movie that doesn't take itself seriously and it shows. Of course it's a twist on the original Jumanji movie that will never capture the same magic. programme.title: Inferno
Inferno
programme.desc:
Inferno: Directed by Ron Howard. With Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones, Omar Sy, Irrfan Khan. When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3062096/","name":"Inferno","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTE2NTkzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDAzOTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3062096/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointing and Predictable Story","reviewBody":"The geneticist Bertrand Zobrist (Ben Foster) is hunted down by three men and commits suicide from the top of a tower in Florence. Zobrist believes that the Earth's population that has an exponential growth should be reduced in 50% to save the other 50%. In Florence, Professor Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) awakens in a hospital with no memory of the last two days and with daydreams and dreadful visions. Dr. Sienna Brooks (Felicity Jones) explains that he has a head trauma cause by a bullet that scratched his head and he would recover his memory in a few days. Out of the blue, a doctor tells that the police wants to interrogate him and a police officer, who is indeed the killer Vayentha (Ana Ularu), shoots the doctor but Sienna and Langdon succeeds to escape to her apartment. Langdon finds a Faraday pointer in the pocket of his jacket and when they project the image, they see the Map of Dante's Inferno by Sandro Botticelli. They contact the American Consulate but give the wrong address nearby the apartment. Soon the area is under siege of the World Health Organization (WHO) agents and the local police, including Vayentha, and Langdon and Sienna conclude that Zobrist has created a virus to annihilate the world's population. But who can be trusted?

"Inferno" completes the trilogy of Dan Brown based on the adventures of Professor Robert Langdon with a totally disappointing and predictable story. The screenplay is a mess and the camera work and edition are awful. Robert Langdon is a superman since he is wounded and with amnesia, but capable of run, jump over the walls, recalls details such as hidden passages and door in different locations etc. The plot point with Sienna Brooks is totally predictable and it was obvious that she had teamed up with Langdon to find where the virus is. The romance between Langdon and Elizabeth Sinskey, performed by the unknown Sidse Babett Knudsen, has no chemistry. In the end, "Inferno" is absolutely forgettable. My vote is five.

Title (Brazil): "Inferno"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":166998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2016-10-13","keywords":"amnesia,church,museum,police,virus","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi396539673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTEwNzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDUzNTUyOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NTEwNzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDUzNTUyOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Sienna Brooks, a doctor he hopes will help him recover his memories. Together, they race across Europe and against the clock to stop a madman from unleashing a global virus that would wipe out half of the world's population."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428065/","name":"Felicity Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0451234/","name":"Irrfan Khan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0105115/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1467010/","name":"Dan Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
Resident Evil 2: Apokalipsa
Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc:
Resident Evil: Apocalypse: Directed by Alexander Witt. With Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Oded Fehr, Thomas Kretschmann. Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0318627/","name":"Resident Evil: Apocalypse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NTUxMzk0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ1MDIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"exxonclerk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"More elements of the game included, worth a matinée.","reviewBody":"Everyone is entitled to their own opinion and I think that's what makes IMDb such a great site for reviews. When a movie trailer peaks my interest, one of the first things I do is come to this site to see what others have thought about the film. Usually there are a variety of opinions ranging from "excellent" to "pure crap" for any movie, no matter how ridiculous it may seem to me and I respect that. It's very disappointing however, to check the reviews and see that virtually no one appreciated a movie that I had high hopes for but have yet to watch. It happened with AvP, in which complaints of bad lighting, bad angles on combat scenes and a general absent-mindedness for logic in the plot ruined any anticipation that built up when watching the trailer over and over. But as I have said, everyone has an opinion and that's what makes sites like this worth checking out. I have benefited from fair reviews in which the critic still disapproves of a movie, but lists it's merits as well as it's faults.

I hope to give a fair review for Resident Evil: Apocalypse. First off, I liked this movie, a little better than the first actually. Apocalypse had a sense of urgency that I thought kept the plot rolling at a nice pace. The actor's performances were alright, I mean really, there was nothing too challenging about their roles. They just had to be convincing at looking scared, angry and eventually dead. The story was laid out decently enough, nothing too innovative or complex, but then again there was nothing innovative or complex about the games in which this movie was based from. I was a fan of the games, for the action and the sheer expasiveness of the settings where the game was played. And that's what I think made this sequel so enjoyable. There were more references and subtle details thrown into this movie making it a more complete game to movie conversion. The action scenes were okay, entertaining and not dragged out. The special effect scenes involving the lickers, explosions, etc were par for the course really, but it was nice to see the slow-mo bullet sequence appear here as it has become a staple of any movie in which a gun is used since the success of the first Matrix and whatever movie the Wachowski Bros ripped it from. The overall location and set of this movie are fantastic, which is it's real claim to fame here. Eerie atmosphere, labyrinthine city, danger around every corner gave the movie the edge that the first didn't quite nail. And finally, the costumes were passable. I liked the Nemesis design, very true to the game and brought to the movie with the same intensity as it had in RE 3. And finally, what everyone thought sent the movie overboard was the Uber-Alice. Did it ruin the movie? Not really. Could the movie have ended the same way if ALice didn't have these powers, I think so. But it would have taken some thought. They destroyed the mutated licker in RE1 okay enough without super powers. Why not just steal Nemesis' bazooka?

The review is getting long here, so I'll wrap it up quickly. Resident Evil Apocalypse is a good movie if measured in terms of action, explosions and atmosphere. It's not going to win any awards for acting at the Oscars, and it's certainly not getting any attention in the horror genre for new and innovative ways to kill people. It's just a flat-out good flick worth a matinée price."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":191694,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-12-29","keywords":"monster,nuclear explosion,explosion,strong female character,strong female lead","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Resident Evil: Apocalypse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2810380569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM5ODI4MWEtMjhhYy00NzU3LTg2YmEtYjczNjExOTBiYzIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM5ODI4MWEtMjhhYy00NzU3LTg2YmEtYjczNjExOTBiYzIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Resident Evil: Apocalypse"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347149/","name":"Sienna Guillory"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531095/","name":"Eric Mabius"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936838/","name":"Alexander Witt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032081/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. Anderson"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: W spirali
W spirali
programme.desc: W spirali: Directed by Konrad Aksinowicz. With Piotr Stramowski, Katarzyna Warnke, Olga Boladz, Antoni Królikowski. An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. Tamir is a witness to, and a catalyst of their problems, a self-appointed healer wishing to become their path to enlightenment. Krzysztof and Agnes know they shouldn't be together but they are unable to part, or perhaps they do not want to? "Into the Spiral" is a story of love which is restless, dangerous and toxic." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4092514/","name":"W spirali","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY3M2NjNWMtNzY3MC00NGY3LWJiNTMtMWEyZTBmZjc4OGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY0OTk2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. programme.title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa
Kochankowie roku tygrysa
programme.desc:
Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

programme.desc: Stealing Harvard: Directed by Bruce McCulloch. With Jason Lee, Tom Green, Leslie Mann, Megan Mullally. A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0265808/","name":"Stealing Harvard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZhMGIyNGMtN2NmYy00OTBhLWE3NWQtMGQ3ZmNmZGUwMDg1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0265808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"a silly comedy that works","reviewBody":"Call me crazy, but I liked this movie. It had its moments. I especially liked Elaine's dad; his character was the funniest. The part where John and Mr. Warner end up in drag at the judge's house was so funny. Then the end was great when John writes I have the picture, and the judge lets him off. And all the silly ideas John and Duff come up with to get the money were quite entertaining. I liked the fact that for once, Tom Green didn't play a gross out character.\n\nFINAL VERDICT: This is a comedy worth seeing. It's only about 80 minutes long, but that's about right for a Tom Green movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2002-09-13","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,harvard,black comedy,crying during sex,voice over narration","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealing Harvard","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4237989913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Stealing Harvard"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005134/","name":"Jason Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338381/","name":"Tom Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005182/","name":"Leslie Mann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567126/","name":"Bruce McCulloch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405271/","name":"Martin Hynes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865847/","name":"Peter Tolan"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114887/","name":"A Walk in the Clouds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGQ5NzI2NWQtODVjZi00NDk1LTg1NmMtZDVlNWMwODZmNGI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114887/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carflo"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful, magical","reviewBody":"This is a magical movie. Even if you turn off the sound and just watch it, it is beautiful. Of course, if you turned off the sound, you would miss the beautiful music. As for the story, it is a fairy tale, totally unrealistic. But it is a very, very romantic fairy tale. I'm an overage, overweight, cynical old lady, but I still cried through half the movie. If you watch this movie, have a big box of tissues, a big box of chocolates, and a large dose of the willing suspension of disbelief. If you have even one romantic bone in your body, you'll love it. If you can't suspend your disbelief, skip it - you will just be irritated.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32997,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1995-08-11","keywords":"falling in love,1940s,aftermath of world war ii,war aftermath,helping someone","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Walk In The Clouds","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3904110873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FlOTU3OGUtZjZkZC00ZjRjLTljMWMtMTVkNDg2MmVlMDQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FlOTU3OGUtZjZkZC00ZjRjLTljMWMtMTVkNDg2MmVlMDQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000206/","name":"Keanu Reeves"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845209/","name":"Aitana Sánchez-Gijón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000063/","name":"Anthony Quinn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000778/","name":"Alfonso Arau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042359/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436543/","name":"Robert Mark Kamen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588903/","name":"Mark Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919386/","name":"Harvey Weitzman"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ma famille et le loup
Chłopiec i wilk
Ma famille et le loup
programme.desc:
Ma famille et le loup: Directed by Adrià García. With Carmen Maura, Pierre Rochefort, Bruno Salomone, Franc Bruneau. 9 years old Hugo spends the summer holidays with his cousins and his grandma Sara. When they learn that the wolf is coming to pick her up, the children are mobilizing to save their grandmother and embark on an unforgettable adventure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5869404/","name":"Ma famille et le loup","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYwNmVlNTctM2MxYS00MWUyLTg0ZTYtYTg2NDIzMWU0YmNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA1MDczNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"9 years old Hugo spends the summer holidays with his cousins and his grandma Sara. When they learn that the wolf is coming to pick her up, the children are mobilizing to save their grandmother and embark on an unforgettable adventure","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5869404/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The wolf always wins.","reviewBody":"In the children's imaginative world there are the goodies (Santa Claus, the Tooth Fairy) and the baddies ( the Wolf ,the Bogey Man) .The Wolf wins in Charles Perrault' s "the Little Red riding Hood" ,even though the tale was often sweetened when told to children (the hunter's intervention).

Grandma met the Wolf when she was young (a little red riding hood ), but she was saved by the man who would become her husband (the equivalent of the hunter).But this summer ,he comes to take her back,now that she is about to celebrate her eightieth birthday.

Her grandchilden are not prepared to accept it ; instead of bickering ,they will spend their holidays looking for a way to prevent grandma from being "wolfed" .But the old lady had already told Hugo -it was the first time he had met her ,for his dad is a workaholic,often on his mobile - there was no sense in trying for she made a deal when she was young,and now her time has come.In the show they stage , granny appears in the finale -after some ponderous acts- just to say goodbye to all her family to urge them to carry on:we survive through our children and our life is eternal.

The movie adds computer animation for the imaginary scenes; the last ones ,in which the wolf intervenes with real characters,a la "Mary Poppins" , are the most successful.

By and large, nevertheless, acting and directing are not equal to the subject :with the exception of the deeply moving Carmen Maura , the actors overplay : the male cast ,particularly , tries to hog the stage and they are almost unbearable ;besides ,in the bakery , they got an incredible nerve ,not exactly an useful example for the young audience ;poetry which was present in Jean-Claude Brialy 's "Eglantine" (1971) on a similar subject is nowhere to be found.

That said, even though the results are not always satisfying , it was a good way to deal with a harsh subject :the ineluctable .The younger audience will certainly need explanations from their parents after viewing it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2019-08-21","keywords":"children","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2453519385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZiZWJhZTAtNThjMS00NWRhLWEzNDMtNDFkYTJlNDdjZWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZiZWJhZTAtNThjMS00NWRhLWEzNDMtNDFkYTJlNDdjZWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0560962/","name":"Carmen Maura"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734004/","name":"Pierre Rochefort"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758912/","name":"Bruno Salomone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2348224/","name":"Adrià García"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0596308/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698042/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0384091/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5526293/","name":"Valérie Magis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1166131/","name":"Stéphane Malandrin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159646/","name":"Víctor Maldonado"}],"duration":"PT1H20M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
Miłość, ślub i inne nieszczęścia
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
programme.desc:
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Maggie Grace, Diane Keaton, Jeremy Irons, Dennis Dugan. It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10235718/","name":"Love, Weddings & Other Disasters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA5NzRjMDktMzc0My00NDdkLThlN2YtNDZiYjM3MGVkY2M4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10235718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ts-0000"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why the hate?","reviewBody":"Was it perfect? Lol-Not at all.

However did have overall parts,that made it watchable.

Casting was decent,most of the storylines & cinematography too."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1451,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"couple","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4041982233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maggie Grace (Taken) and Oscar® winners Diane Keaton and Jeremy Irons lead this warmhearted romantic comedy. With a couple’s impending wedding as the backdrop, Love, Weddings & Other Disasters weaves multiple storylines as it follows the search for love by a colorful group of characters including: an inexperienced wedding planner (Grace) nicknamed “The Wedding Trasher”; a fussy celebrity caterer (Irons); his blind date (Keaton); and a tour-bus guide (Andrew Bachelor) looking for his Cinderella. How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
Szklana pułapka 5
A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc:
A Good Day to Die Hard: Directed by John Moore. With Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead. John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1606378/","name":"A Good Day to Die Hard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzgyNzUzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAwOTA5OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1606378/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"johnnymacbest"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"I kept an open mind, but so much was left to be desired.","reviewBody":"In the early '80s and '90s, the "Die Hard" series of films were all about entertainment. Sure it's not a thought-provoking piece of art, but it's art done with class, integrity and art; these films were made at a time when action films were..actually..action films. They had no quick-style MTV editing that tries to pass itself off as "action", they were done with pure and honest craftsmanship with stunt men willing to put it all out for all to see. And for that aspect alone, they did a commendable job.

So now I look at A Good Day to Die Hard, with all the trappings that action films are known for and ostentatious hijinks that scream Michael Bay-esque action that reeks of his earlier films to date.

Bruce Willis plays McClane to a hilt, but that's all there is. No heartwarming moments, no instances of morality, no deep insights into why he kills his enemies, John McClane is just that. John McClane. A bravado of words and action that homages the earlier films.

The movie at times tries to be gritty and funny at the same time, but with such an inane screenplay and unfunny jokes, it becomes quite apparent that this film was simply not meant to continue the series. To try to adapt an relic of the '80s and '90s into a modern context with current technology, doesn't work anymore. The only exception to this is Rambo, where he was fighting against a brutal regime in Southeast Asia. It worked because the setting was raw in it's brutal intensity; plus Rambo is a timeless hero and much more plausible. John McClane is just a beefed-up Jack Bauer without the hero's legendary outbursts of anger when something goes wrong or impedes him from saving the day. Not once is there a chance for the viewer to root for McClane. He remains lifeless and stiff; the very opposite of his portrayal in the earlier films.

In an attempt to distance itself from its PG-13 predecessor, the film makers decided to make this film rated R. Yet it hardly saved the film from it's mediocre direction. I suspect this was due to the large backlash from audiences of Live Free or Die Hard, a film that was only a Die Hard film in name only, not a "true" Die Hard film, which is evident in the director's inability to handle the material.

I tried to keep an open mind, after the execrable LFODH, but after this, I hope Bruce and co. just hang up the wife beater for the final time. No more. John McClane is a hero of the past and should be left there for all time's sake.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":202544,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-02-14","keywords":"john mcclane character,repeat sequel,subjective camera,john f. kennedy international airport,taxi","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1541121817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4OTExMjg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzUyMzE5OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4OTExMjg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzUyMzE5OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working to prevent a nuclear-weapons heist, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2541974/","name":"Jai Courtney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462407/","name":"Sebastian Koch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601382/","name":"John Moore"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129985/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0940790/","name":"Skip Woods"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0861636/","name":"Roderick Thorp"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Z odzysku
Z odzysku
programme.desc:
Z odzysku: Directed by Slawomir Fabicki. With Antoni Pawlicki, Nataliya Vdovina, Jacek Braciak, Dimitri Melnichuk. 19 year old Wojtek lives in a poverty stricken Polish town. He is in love with an older woman, an illegal emigrant from Ukraine. He boxes in illegal matches to get money and is spotted by a man running a security business. Accepting this man's offer means becoming a gangster, but this could allow him to a residence permit for his girlfriend Katya." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0800275/","name":"Z odzysku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAwYmI3NGMtZTJhOS00NDQ4LWIwN2EtZjFmYjA4ODQ0MDg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"19 year old Wojtek lives in a poverty stricken Polish town. He is in love with an older woman, an illegal emigrant from Ukraine. He boxes in illegal matches to get money and is spotted by a man running a security business. Accepting ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800275/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sclerozo"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Weak and shallow plot and result is a dismal movie","reviewBody":"I was unlucky to see this movie at the Toronto International Film Festival and now by chance I came across it on IDMB. I was hoping it might have been a movie I missed and after realizing what it is I decided to post my comment.

I can't believe how this pathetic movie garnered some awards as it appears to have. The plot is banal and approaches stupid as the unconvincing downfall of this man is portrayed. Somehow the director tries to portray that hard work will get you nowhere in post-communist Poland and the attachment with a gang lifestyle also leads to a calamity. The ending is so abrupt and unexpected that it leaves the audience wondering whether the film reel missed a splicing. 

I would like to watch a Polish movie worthy of the time to see it and this one falls so far behind that and I truly regret the wasted time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-17","keywords":"fall from height,accident,kissing,male female relationship,marriage proposal","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2252397/","name":"Antoni Pawlicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891502/","name":"Nataliya Vdovina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102765/","name":"Jacek Braciak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264614/","name":"Slawomir Fabicki"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147152/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264614/","name":"Slawomir Fabicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367885/","name":"Denijal Hasanovic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2256587/","name":"Marek Pruchniewski"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

Accepting ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800275/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sclerozo","dateCreated":"2008-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Weak and shallow plot and result is a dismal movie","reviewBody":"I was unlucky to see this movie at the Toronto International Film Festival and now by chance I came across it on IDMB. I was hoping it might have been a movie I missed and after realizing what it is I decided to post my comment.

I can't believe how this pathetic movie garnered some awards as it appears to have. The plot is banal and approaches stupid as the unconvincing downfall of this man is portrayed. Somehow the director tries to portray that hard work will get you nowhere in post-communist Poland and the attachment with a gang lifestyle also leads to a calamity. The ending is so abrupt and unexpected that it leaves the audience wondering whether the film reel missed a splicing. 

I would like to watch a Polish movie worthy of the time to see it and this one falls so far behind that and I truly regret the wasted time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-17","keywords":"fall from height,accident,kissing,male female relationship,marriage proposal","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2252397/","name":"Antoni Pawlicki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891502/","name":"Nataliya Vdovina","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102765/","name":"Jacek Braciak"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264614/","name":"Slawomir Fabicki"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147152/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264614/","name":"Slawomir Fabicki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367885/","name":"Denijal Hasanovic","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2256587/","name":"Marek Pruchniewski"],"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Statysci
Statyści
programme.desc: Statysci: Directed by Michal Kwiecinski. With Kinga Preis, Stanislaw Brudny, Krzysztof Kiersznowski, Malgorzata Buczkowska. Chinese film crew are looking for people with sadly-looking faces, and therefore decide to make a small Polish town their major filming location. But are Poles really as gloomy and depressed as they look like at first sight?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0896977/","name":"Statysci","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRhNGVhMmItZjY4ZC00NTk3LThmMzItYWZmYzEwZTk1NGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Chinese film crew are looking for people with sadly-looking faces, and therefore decide to make a small Polish town their major filming location. But are Poles really as gloomy and depressed as they look like at first sight?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0896977/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moi_kamiar"},"dateCreated":"2009-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Homage to Love and Happy Ending","reviewBody":"Just think of a Chinese film crew, trying to shoot a stupid melodramatic fare in Poland with Polish extras! Producer of numerous Wajda's films including KATYN, Michal Kwiecinski in a witty directorial venture, EXTRAS, explores how modern men think of surrendering to Chinese Wave and drowning in its vast sea, when there's nothing left in his homeland, but a wasteland! A big yes to EXTRAS (2006) and its Homage to Love and Happy Ending! However in this enthusiastic farce, most of deductions seem absurd - for instance it is clear that if the Chinese director announces that, "Poland is second China and China is second Poland", the Polish photographer replies, "The situation is not good in Poland!!!" The absurdity is resonated in the duologue's of the melodrama they're shooting. The alienated Polish characters and enhancement of their relationship during the work are phenomenally inspiring, but the Chinese stereotypes - especially the childish director with his beloved goldfish - are not convincing at all.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":251,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-10-27","keywords":"town","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695835/","name":"Kinga Preis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115711/","name":"Stanislaw Brudny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0452609/","name":"Krzysztof Kiersznowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477187/","name":"Michal Kwiecinski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034872/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1008161/","name":"Jaroslaw Sokól"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jestem Andrzejem
programme.desc: Marek, introwertyczny informatyk po trzydziestce, próbuje odnaleźć się w szalonym świecie swojej młodszej dziewczyny Julki. W wyniku kłótni para się rozstaje. Marek samotnie wraca do domu, przechodząc przez ulicę zostaje śmiertelnie potrącony przez samochód. W ten sposób trafia do zaświatów. Dzięki pomocy tajemniczego chłopaka udaje mu się wrócić do żywych.

programme.title: Pinocchio
Pinokio
Pinocchio
programme.desc:
Pinocchio: Directed by Matteo Garrone. With Federico Ielapi, Roberto Benigni, Rocco Papaleo, Massimo Ceccherini. Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8333746/","name":"Pinocchio","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzgxNWJiOWQtZDA5Mi00NjBkLWIxMzUtZTg3Yjk5NjYyMDZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8333746/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"petra_ste"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fine adaptation of a classic","reviewBody":"This is a largely faithful, visually neat adaptation of Collodi's classic of children's literature. Talented director Matteo Garrone (Il Racconto dei Racconti, Dogman, L'Imbalsamatore) keeps the darker side of his imagination at bay and correctly puts his visual talent in service of the story.

Performances are solid; Roberto Benigni is much better as Geppetto - warm, paternal, lovably awkward - than he was as Pinocchio. Even the kids are fine, with Ielapi as the titular protagonist, the naive, stubborn but well-meaning Pinocchio, Baldari Calabria as the quietly mischievous young fairy and Di Domenicantonio as toxic friend Lucignolo.

Special mention to the excellent make-up and costumes.

7,5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11019,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2019-12-19","keywords":"based on children's book,puppet,marionette,toymaker,role played by multiple actors","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3542466841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE3ZGNmYjUtOTY2MS00NjAwLWE1NmQtODkyN2NmNTg5YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE3ZGNmYjUtOTY2MS00NjAwLWE1NmQtODkyN2NmNTg5YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shot in stunning Italian locations, Matteo Garrone's rich world of mystery and wonder stars Academy Award® winning actor Roberto Benigni as Geppetto, the old woodcarver whose puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio (nine-year-old Federico Ielapi) tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits through a wonderful world full of imaginative creatures - from the belly of a giant fish, to the Land Of Toys and the Field Of Miracles."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9130105/","name":"Federico Ielapi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000905/","name":"Roberto Benigni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0660266/","name":"Rocco Papaleo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0308520/","name":"Matteo Garrone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078912/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0230609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0172830/","name":"Carlo Collodi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0308520/","name":"Matteo Garrone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147592/","name":"Massimo Ceccherini"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

Kiler
programme.desc: Kiler: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Jerzy Stuhr, Janusz Rewinski. An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0127626/","name":"Kiler","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNWMxYWEtODUwMC00ZDRjLWI0MmQtMjFjNTFiMDYwZDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0127626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cjpok"},"dateCreated":"1999-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of action with funny twists","reviewBody":"This could easily be called the Polish version of "Pulp Fiction" but thank God, it is not. It is captivating from the very get-go, keeping the viewing audience as hostage to the very end. Although unique in style and approach, it is universal and could appeal to any audience, anywhere in the world. A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9308382/","name":"The High Note","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJjNGM0MWYtOTIwOS00NTEzLThhMWUtMzI4YzBjOGM0YmRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9308382/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bigmdeedub"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Proof great that movies drown in garbage...","reviewBody":"This film is the perfect example of great art, sabotage by 'critic' reviews. The entire truth of The High Note is summed up in its central message; the music is what matters. Not gimmicky remixes or auto tuned production, but REAL music that moves you. The weak attempts to tarnish this gem of a story, will be effortlessly cast aside by those not caught up in what the industry spoon feeds the masses. At one point a particular review attacks this film with 'it handles conflict in the nicest possible way' as if we as humans can't evolve to a place of civility.

As a father I am grateful for the creative forces behind this project. Ms. Ross' performance is authentic. Dakota's character breathes real air. Ice Cube causes the audience to contract empathy for the human condition. The only change that would've been even more icing on this tasty cake, would be the song 'I don't really care' being a larger part of the movie.

Nice work Rotten Tomatoes. Way to back up your name with your rotten review of one of the truly good features of 2020...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8836,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-05-29","keywords":"recording session,reference to taylor swift,reference to the weeknd,reference to the beatles,reference to jerry wexler","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The High Note - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1053998617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODdiNDY3ZmMtZGY0NS00NGM2LWJjOWItNjZjNTFhZDg4YTljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODdiNDY3ZmMtZGY0NS00NGM2LWJjOWItNjZjNTFhZDg4YTljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424848/","name":"Dakota Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0743896/","name":"Tracee Ellis Ross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5123156/","name":"Kelvin Harrison Jr."}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304091/","name":"Nisha Ganatra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5958525/","name":"Flora Greeson"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hitchcock
Hitchcock
programme.desc:
Hitchcock: Directed by Sacha Gervasi. With Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston. The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0975645/","name":"Hitchcock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAwNDI5NjIwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc4ODc2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0975645/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ChooseyAMovie"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Keep the Hitch, drop the Cock.","reviewBody":"Hitchcock follows Alfred Hitchcock's strenuous quest to complete a picture to which everyone deemed awful. Also incorporated into the storyline is the love story of Alfred and his wife. And the strain the picture was putting on it.

I had high hopes for Hitchcock. Alfred Hitchcock may not be my favorite director but he was most defiantly light years ahead of his time and undeniably a genius. On top of that Psycho is one of my favorite films ever made. So far this film was shaping up to be fantastic, it appealed to me in all the right ways, trailer was good, Anthony Hopkins as Hitchcock and it was about the making of Psycho. To which, aspiring filmmakers as well as the average movie goer can really appreciate. So why only a 7/10?

Well, the film delved too deeply into the love story, I personally think. The film is very enjoyable and to that aspect of the film, I don't mind as much as you may perceive but withholding that aspect and indulging on the actual making of Psycho could have really benefited this film. It's not the film Hitchcock or Psycho fans will love, it will be a film where you walk out and remark, "that was good," but not a very solid good. And normally I would be inclined to agree with you, but for some reason I still did like this film.

It contains fantastic acting including Hopkins, albeit certain scenes he may have overacted a tad bit, it's interesting and is enjoyable. In addition it also contains great references albeit not very subtle, the complete opposite of subtle to Psycho and a few other Hitchcock films which work to its advantage in my opinion. I also rather liked the inclusion of Ed Gein and the conversations that took place between him and Hitchcock.

Basically this film will appeal to everyone. But, unfortunately it isn't the film it could have been or should have been, but ultimately it is enjoyable, funny and above all entertaining. If you're a fan of Hitchcock and Psycho though, don't get your hopes up too high.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-12-14","keywords":"year 1959,1950s,los angeles california,studio executive,censorship board","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2501551129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho in 1959."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0315065/","name":"Sacha Gervasi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199880/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118469/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0572352/","name":"John J.
